1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural risk-takers, but may underestimate costs and overestimate abilities.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Practical but conservative, tend to avoid taking unnecessary risks.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, often take calculated risks with a clear understanding of the stakes.
4. Cancer - 4/10 - Emotionally driven, may make impulsive decisions based on feelings rather than logic.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and charismatic, tend to take bold risks with a strong sense of self-assurance.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, may avoid taking risks altogether due to fear of mistakes.
7. Libra - 6/10 - Balanced and diplomatic, tend to weigh pros and cons before making a decision, but may still take calculated risks.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, often take bold risks with a deep emotional investment in the outcome.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, tend to take risks without fully considering potential consequences.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Disciplined and responsible, may avoid taking unnecessary risks due to fear of failure or loss of reputation.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, often take calculated risks with a strong sense of social responsibility.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Emotionally intuitive, may make impulsive decisions based on gut feelings rather than logic.
